Retrieve List of Available Securities

Collection of functions for listing basic information on available securities and cryptocurrencies

Retrieve Real-Time Quotes of Available Securities

Collection of functions providing real-time quotes of various securities and cryptocurrencies

Company Profile

Company Balance Sheet

Company Cash Flow

Company Key Metrics

Company Rating

fmp_dcf()

SEC Filing and Institutional Funds

Collection of functions providing information related to SEC Reported information and Institutional investment funds

fmp_sec_filings()

SEC RSS Feed

fmp_13f()

Form 13-F Statements

API Utilities

Utility functions for connecting to the FMP API

fmp_api_key()

Install a Financial Modeling Prep API Key in Your .Renviron File for Repeated Use
